block_comment: This Verilog RTL block initializes the cmd_addr_string array with string representations of commands and addresses for a memory communication protocol. The strings represent command signals like CS_N, RAS_N, CAS_N, WE_N, and BA commands. It also includes address (ADDR) strings for a 16-bit address space. The block is executed initially and sets up the interface definitions for the following memory operations.
